title: Cuffs, early 18th–19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: deflected element work
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Pair of openwork cuffs, each in the shape of a trapezoid. Each cuff has a design of a cartouche enclosing a ribbon tied bouquet of flowers and an ornamental scroll at the bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cuffs, early 18th–19th century.
early 18th–19th century. Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: deflected element work. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-58-21-a,b.
